title: Talking to Your Partner About Postpartum Feelings
summary: Open communication helps you both cope better.
text: Share your emotional ups and downs with your partner. It strengthens connection and helps them support you more effectively.

title: The Importance of Self-Care After Childbirth
text: Taking even 10 minutes for yourself daily can boost mental clarity and mood. Prioritize small joys like a walk, a warm bath, or journaling.

title: Building a Support System After Birth
summary: You don’t have to do it all alone — reach out.
text: Whether it's family, friends, or local groups, staying connected can reduce feelings of isolation and stress during postpartum.
